pages.text: Maids are capable of doing a lot of things; here is a (inexhaustive) list of them: $(li)By default, maids will find and pick up nearby items, arrows and xp orbs. You can adjust this behavior in the Maid GUI. $(li) By default, maids will follow their owner (master?).

$(li)Sneak-right-clicking a maid with an empty hand will put it into Sitting Mode. In this mode, maids will not do anything (they won't even dodge attacks). $(li)Sneak-right-clicking maids with an empty hand will cause them to dismount any mount they are riding. $(li)Maids will consume any potions or golden apples fed to thme using right click.
$(li)Right-clicking maids with empty bottles will fill the bottle with any experience the maid has collected from the ground, returning a Bottle o' Enchanting.
